report.title: Groups for page
report.description: Lists groups available to a user that are linked to a given page.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM groups g JOIN groups_users gu ON gu.group_id=g.id AND gu.deleted=false AND gu.user_id=#currentUser# JOIN group_pages gp ON gp.group_id=g.id AND gp.deleted=false AND (gp.administrator=false OR gu.administrator=true) AND gp.path = '#path#' JOIN cache_termlists_terms gt on gt.id=g.group_type_id #joins# WHERE g.deleted = false AND #website_filter#

param.name: group_type_id
param.description: Limit the report to a certain type of group

param.name: from_group_id
param.description: Only include groups which are linked to from another group (e.g. an organisation which parents a list of projects).
param.join: JOIN group_relations grfrom ON grfrom.to_group_id=g.id AND grfrom.from_group_id=#from_group_id# AND grfrom.deleted=false

param.name: path
param.description: Path to the page the group must be linked to
